description: The Lady Fern is an evergreen perennial which is one of the most popular ferns due to its delicate fronds and attractive foliage. It grows in a bright, arching form which adds texture and livens up any garden. It thrives in part to full shade, is low-maintenance and makes for a great ground cover. The variegated 'Veroniae Cristatum' variety is especially stunning with bold sienna red fronds highlighted with creamy-colored edges. It will brighten up a garden while providing diversity of texture and color. A must-have for gardeners!
